location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Map showing proposed RAF air route between UK and the Far East and contemplated US route between North Africa and the Far East

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on paper with manuscript addition in blue inkDimensions: 314 x 466mm, on sheet 333 x 500mm

mods.abstract: The map is appended to a report by the Joint Planning Staff – a subcommittee of the Chiefs of Staff Committee – examining proposals by the United States for a military air transit route between the Far East and North Africa: JP (46) 142 (Final) see folios 123-135.The map shows most of the globe with the planned Royal Air Force route illustrated in black and the contemplated US route shown in red. Uncertain portions of the US route are shown as dashed lines, and proposed landing places on both routes have been highlighted. This particular map contains manuscript additions in blue ink.It contains the following printing statement ‘Geographical Section, General Staff, 1942’.
